snippet.title: Hexadecordle 66 | Hexadecordle Gameplay |Daily Hexadecordle for April 23, 2022 |Today's Hexadecordle
snippet.description:
Hexadecordle, by Alfie Rayner, is like 16 Wordles. This word guessing game is all about solving 16 Wordle's at a time! So, Hexadecordle Game / Hexadecordlegame / hexadecordlegame is 16x Wordle, 8x Dordle, 4x Quordle and 2x Octordle. Don't mispelled it as Hexadecordel / hexadecordel.

This video is Hexadecordle Answers / Solutions / Answer Words for 23 April, 2022 (04/23/2022). You will learn how to play hexadecordle after watching this video.

Hexadecordle Game Link: https://hexadecordle.co.uk/

How to play?: 
Basic theme of this game is based on Wordle. You have to guess all SIXTEEN Hexadecordle words in 232 tries. Each guess must be a valid 5 letter word. Hit the enter button to submit. After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word. When you type a guess in Hexadecordle, you will guess that word for all SIXTEEN words that you are solving. All sixteen words you are solving will be different. You will have 23 guesses to get all 16 words correct. Good luck!
